posts.post_content:
I am very interested in chatting with the lucky few who own Young, Johnson, or Matty portrait's with the Brown Hindu back. I used to own nice looking Matty and Young portraits but have since parted with them like a putz. I am fine with pretty much anything so long as it is not a real "beater".

I have the below cards and money as needed to make deals. If you have a match please feel free to pm me or write me at [url]info@t206society.com[/url] and I will send you scans of whatever interests you.

Thank you!

Derek

Eddie Collins ... AB 350 framed ... PSA 5
Chief Bender "trees" ... Cycle 350 ... PSA 6
Ed Walsh ... Brown Hindu ... SGC 3 
Frank Chance "yellow portrait" ... Cycle 460 ... PSA 2.5 
Addie Joss "portrait" ... Old Mill ... PSA 3
Rube Marquard "portrait ... AB 350 framed ... PSA 3.5
Frank Baker ... AB 350 no frame ... PSA 2.5
Zack Wheat ... Tolstoi ... PSA 4.5
Nap Lajoie "bat" ... Polar Bear ... PSA 3
Willie Keeler "portrait" ... El Principe ... SGC 3
Hal Chase "loving cup" ... Sovereign 460 ... SGC 4
